tasks.title: Design User Registration Flow
tasks.description: Design a user-friendly registration flow with email and social media account options.

tasks.description: Create a user-friendly frontend for user registration with validation and error handling.

tasks.description: Create a user-friendly frontend for user login with validation and error handling.

tasks.title: Design Chatbot Conversation Flow

tasks.description: Create a user-friendly frontend for tracking health metrics with visualization and insights.

tasks.description: Optimize database queries for better performance.
